title: Game Market 1983 - Novel Updates
genre: Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Psychological   Romance   Sci-fi   Shounen
tags: Artifacts   Business Management   Clever Protagonist   Determined Protagonist   Game Elements   Level System   Male Protagonist   Modern Day   Modern Knowledge   Previous Life Talent   Programmer   Sudden Wealth   Time Travel   Wealthy Characters
author: Son InSung   손인성
description:
“Young man… if you could go back in time, what period would you  like to be in?”

Kang Junhyuk, a game developer in the year 2015, meets an old man in a run-down arcade store and travels to the year 1983, the era of retro gaming…>
